Text: Yeah,I know...to much times between issues...

I read that #4/#5 will be released together to catch up - believe it when i see it. Love Millar stuff but he does TOO MUCH and is too erratic with scheduling. Are we ever gonna see more Superior or Nemesis2??
yeeeeeeeeah boy! its supposed to be on a regular schedule starting with this issue

Superior should be out next month or so I've heard.As for kick-ass maybe Romita Jr. can't draw faster since he is drawing Avengers too,but I doubt that that's the issue since he has already tackled 2 books a month in the past...
Awesome! Thanks so much! I'll seed indefinitely.

millar recently blamed the delay on 'scheduling issues', but tbh, he's not exactly got a good track record on completing his creations in a timely manner.........if at all!

Anyways it's here (about efffing time!) - thanks for the ul, MM! :-)
Thank you soooooo much! Can't even begin to tell you how much this means to me.
